JVEWRKB01:

Pressing Finish after going through the Example wizard does nothing.  The window
is not dismissed, and the example is not created.  The error below shows up in
the .log.

Defect occurs due to api/behavior changes in M9. Releasing fixes in class
VisualClassExampleWizard.
1.0M2 is out, so these are now closed in M2.
